name: OpenAI Agents API

description: A platform for creating AI agents that work collaboratively across tasks.

description: A framework to generate and deploy AI agents automatically.

description: An open-source SDK for building AI agents with a focus on semantic understanding.

description: A framework for developing and scaling language model applications.

description: A framework designed for building AI agents that can perform tasks autonomously.

name: Hugging Face Smolagents
description: A collection of lightweight AI agents designed for easy deployment.

description: A workflow automation tool that includes AI agents for automating tasks.

name: getstream
description: A service for building multi-agent AI applications with integrated chat features.

name: AutoGPT
description: An extension of GPT technology for building autonomous AI agents.
